summary: CIA Director (1997-2004) - Iraq WMD intelligence, enhanced interrogation, 9/11
key_facts: CIA Director under Clinton and Bush (1997-2004)
'Slam dunk' WMD intelligence briefing to Bush (2002)
Iraq WMD claims used to justify 2003 invasion - no WMDs found
Pre-9/11 warnings allegedly not acted upon
Resigned July 2004 amid Iraq intelligence failures
Awarded Medal of Freedom despite intelligence failures
concealment: Pre-9/11 intelligence handling, enhanced interrogation authorization details
